WorkItem.Description:
Im getting the error:
 
 
 
The following currently equipped items are not available
 
 
 
Items list
 
"
"
"
"
Would you like to make them available and continue with the optimization?
 
Yes, No Cancel
 
 
 
If i press yes, i get the same mssgs again, if i press no i get:
 
 
 
You have not selected any of the following:
 
 
 
(all the items, head, shoulder chest wrist hands ect.)
 
To select the items, go to their related slot charts and mark them with a Green Diamond. For more information, see the Rawr Documentation pages at rawr..codeplex.com
 
The following slots have a very large number of items selectd:
 
Back Items
 
Do you want to continue with the optimization?
 
OK, Cancel.
 
 
 
But everything is marked with the green diamonds, since 4.3.4 i get this error, in previous versions i diddnt had these issues..
 
 
 
What to do?

Comments.Message: Please attach your character xml so that we can investigate.

I have this same issue with boomkin and the items it says I don't have selected are Archivist's Gloves,  Chillbane belt, and Slippers of Wizardry.

I load from battle.net, I am using 4.3.7.   If you want to try it with my profile I am on Lightbringer and name is Kelathor
I was able to reproduce this, it has to do with you having a cloth item while the model is reporting that it can't be equipped. I'll implement a workaround for this.
